remarks: This theorem is in fact a copy of ~ com14 , and repeated here to demonstrate a simple proof scheme.  The number '4' in the theorem name indicates that a chain of length 4 is modified. See ~ wl-impchain-com-1.x for more information how this proof is generated.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 7-Jul-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-impchain-com-1.4.1 $e |- ( et -> ( th -> ( ch -> ( ps -> ph ) ) ) ) $.
wl-impchain-com-1.4 $p |- ( ps -> ( th -> ( ch -> ( et -> ph ) ) ) ) $.
